## nominalBold() function

Creates a d3-compatible nominal (bold) scale using the theme. Returns a function that takes a key and returns an appropriate color.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function nominalBold(theme: Theme, size: number): (key: any) => string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  theme | Theme | the theme |
|  size | number | the scale size |

<b>Returns:</b>

(key: any) =&gt; string
